wxl 1"700 - 2011 wfm%a,a ui 01 jeks isl=rdod - 2011'04'01
^rcfha n,hmsg m%isoaO lrk ,§&
II fldgi – wêlrK
msgqj
mk;a ... ... ... ... —
mk;a flgqïm;a ... ... ... ... —
fY%aIaGdêlrKfha ±kaùï ... ... ... ... —
Y%S ,xld weme,a Widúfha ±kaùï ... ... ... —
fY%aIaGdêlrKfha wmrdO kvq ieis ms<sn| ksfõok ... —
Èid wêlrK yd ufyia;%d;a wêlrK ±kaùï ... 112
^fjk fjku f.dkq lr .; yels mßÈ iEu fldgilg u wh;a tla tla  NdIdjlg fjk fjk msgq wxl fhdod we;'&
i;sm;d ksl=;a jk .eiÜ m;%fhys m<lsÍu  i|yd Ndr.kq ,nk ±kaùï ms<sn|
jeo.;a ksfõokhhs
Y%S ,xld m%cd;dka;%sl iudcjd§ ckrcfha .eiÜ m;%fha wjika msgqfõ iEu udihl u uq,a i;sfha § m< lrk ksfõok Ndr.kakd
Èkhka iy fõ,djka ms<sn|j ñka wjOdkh fhduq lrkq ,efí'
.eiÜ m;%fha m< lsÍu i|yd Ndr.kakd ish¨ u oekaùï .eiÜ m;%h m<lrkq ,nk Èkhg i;s follg fmr isl=rdod
Èkfhys oyj,a 12'00 g wjika lrkq ,efí' ;k;=re - wenE¾;=" úNd." fgkav¾ iy fjkafoais ms<sn| oekaùïj, wjika Èk iy
fõ,djka ta ms<sn|j Wkkaÿjla olajk whg m%udKj;a ld, fõ,djla ,efnk mßÈ fhdod.; hq;= njg" ish¨ u fomd¾;fïka;=" ixia:d
iy uKav, hkdÈh j.n,d.; hq;= nj ñka wjOdrKh flf¾' m<lsÍu i|yd tjkq ,nk iEu oekaùula u ;ks me;af;a muKla
meyeÈ,sj msgm;a l< hq;= h' ksrjoH;djh ms<sn|j lrk úuiSï iy meñKs,s 
.eiÜ m;%h m< jQ Èk isg f;uilg miqj Ndr.kq
fkd,efí'
.eiÜ m;%fha m< lrk iEu oekaùula u .eiÜ m;%h m< lrkq ,nk Èkg i;s follg fmr tkï" 2011 wfm%a,a ui 08 jeks
Èk m< flfrk .eiÜ m;%fha oekaùï 2011 ud¾;= ui 25 jeks Èk oyj,a 12'00g fyda Bg fmr ;emEf,ka fyda f.kú;a rcfha
uqøKd,hg NdrÈh hq;= h'
,Ëuka .=KjO_k"
rcfha uqøKd,hdêm;s'
2010 ckjdß ui 01 jeks Èk"
fld<U 08"
rcfha uqøK fomd¾;fïka;=fõ § h'
111 - B 801211 —2,200 (2011/04)
D 1 -
    msgqj
jia;= Nx.;aj kvq ms<sn| ±kaùï ... ... ... —
msial,a ud¾I,ajrekaf.a m;a lsÍï ... ... ... —
msial,a úlsKSu ms<sn| ±kaùï ... ... ... —

II fldgi - Y%S ,xld m%cd;dka;%sl iudcjd§ ckrcfha .eiÜ m;%h  - 2011'04'01112
Èid wêlrK yd ufyia;%d;a wêlrK oekaùï
y,dj; osid$ufyia;%d;a wêlrKh
1894 wxl 12 ork fkdjákd f,aLk úkdY lsÍfï wd{dmkf;a 5 jeks j.ka;sh m%ldrj lrkq ,nk ksfõokh'
fuu wêlrKh bÈßfha wjika ù we;s jir mylg ^05& jvd merKs my; Wmf,aLkfha olajd we;s kvq jd¾;d 1894 wxl 12
ork fkdjákd f,aLk úkdY lsÍfï wd{dmkf;a 5 jeks j.ka;sfha úê úOdk m%ldrj fuu oekaùu m%isoaO lrk ,o Èk isg
udi ;=kla ^03& bl=;a ùfuka miqj úkdY lrk nj fuhska okajd isáñ'
Wmf,aLkfha olajd we;s kvq jd¾;dj, msgm;a fyda fjk;a Bg wod< f,aLk ,nd .ekSug Wkkaÿjla olajk ;eke;a;ka úiska
fuu oekaùu m%isoaO lrk ,o Èk isg udi ;=kla ^03& bl=;a ùug fmr ta i|yd b,a¨ï l< hq;= njg o lsishï kvq jd¾;djla
úkdY fkdl, hq;= njg Wkkaÿjla olajk ;eke;af;l= isà kï fuu oekaùu m%isoaO lrk ,o Èk isg udi ;=kla bl=;a ùug
fmr ;ud úiska u fyda kS;s{jrfhl= u.ska h:d mßÈ bÈßm;a lrkq ,nk fm;aiula u.ska idOdrK fya;= bÈßm;a lsÍug l%shd
l< hq;= njg o fuhska ksfõokh lrkq ,efí'
c.;a ta' ly|.uf.a"

II fldgi - Y%S ,xld m%cd;dka;%sl iudcjd§ ckrcfha .eiÜ m;%h  - 2011'04'01134
.eiÜ m;%h m< lsÍu ms<sn|j jeo.;a ksfõokhhs
i;sm;d uqøKh jk Y%S ,xld m%cd;dka;%sl iudcjd§ ckrcfha  .eiÜ m;%h idudkHfhka  isl=rdod Èkj, m<  lrkq ,efí'
isl=rdod Èkhla rcfha ksjdvq Èkhla jQ  úg tu isl=rdod  Èkg m%:u jev lrk Èkfha .eiÜ m;%h m< lrkq ,efí'  ta wkqj .eiÜ
m;%fha  m< lsÍu i|yd  ksfõok Ndr.kakd wka;su  Èkh o tu i;sfha we;sjk  ksjdvq Èk .Kk wkqj fjkia  jkq  we;'
ta ta .eiÜ m;%fha m< lsÍu i|yd ±kaùï Ndr .kakd wka;su Èkh iy fõ,djka  my; m< lr we;s Wmf,aLkfha ±lafõ'
my; i|yka  kshñ;  fõ,djg  miq ,efnkk  ish¿u ±kaùï th tjQ wh fj; ;emEf,ka  wdmiq tjkq ,efí'  B<Õ .eiÜ m;%fha
